code: import React from'react';import{IMAGE_URL}from'../config';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MovieCard=_ref=>{let{movie,addToWatchlist,removeFromWatchlist,isWatchlist}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-gray-800 rounded-lg overflow-hidden shadow-lg hover:scale-105 transform transition duration-300",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/movie/".concat(movie.id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:IMAGE_URL+movie.poster_path,alt:movie.title,className:"w-full h-72 object-cover"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-lg font-semibold",children:movie.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Rating: ",movie.vote_average]}),isWatchlist?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>removeFromWatchlist(movie),className:"mt-2 w-full bg-red-600 py-1 rounded hover:bg-red-500",children:"Remove"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>addToWatchlist(movie),className:"mt-2 w-full bg-orange-500 py-1 rounded hover:bg-orange-400",children:"Add to Watchlist"})]})]});};export default MovieCard;
